name: Harold HOWARD, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee

parties: Harold HOWARD, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, to wit, this 19th day of March, 1996, the appeal is dismissed as moot.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
673 A.2d 866
Harold HOWARD, Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
March 19, 1996.
